meta.defaultDescription: Privacy-first organizing platform built on Nostr protocol for activist groups, co-ops, unions, and community organizers.
meta.home: Your activity feed with posts, events, and community updates from your groups.
meta.messages: Secure, end-to-end encrypted messaging for private conversations.
meta.groups: Create and manage groups for organizing, mutual aid, and community building.
meta.events: Coordinate events, rallies, workshops, and community gatherings.
meta.mutualAid: Share resources, offer help, and coordinate community support.
meta.governance: Democratic decision-making with proposals, voting, and consensus building.
meta.wiki: Collaborative knowledge base for documentation and organizing resources.
meta.crm: Manage contacts, track outreach, and coordinate campaign efforts.
meta.settings: Manage your profile, privacy, security, and notification preferences.
meta.login: Sign in to your account or create a new identity.
meta.recovery: Recover your account with your recovery phrase.
meta.notFound: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
meta.security: Security settings and encryption key management.
meta.notifications: Configure how you receive alerts and updates.
meta.privacy: Control your data visibility and privacy settings.
meta.preferences: Customize your experience with display and language settings.
meta.analytics: View engagement metrics and group activity statistics.
meta.files: Secure file storage and sharing for your groups.
meta.documents: Create and collaborate on rich text documents.
meta.database: Custom databases and structured data management.
meta.fundraising: Organize fundraising campaigns and track donations.
meta.newsletters: Create and send newsletters to your community.
meta.forms: Build custom forms for surveys, signups, and data collection.
meta.pages: Publish public-facing pages for your group or campaign.
meta.bookmarks: Your saved posts, events, and content.

login.passwordHint: Minimum 8 characters. This password encrypts your private keys.
login.importPasswordHint: This password will encrypt your imported key locally.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.securityNote: Your private key will be encrypted with this password. It never leaves your device unencrypted.

recovery.title: Secure Your Account
recovery.description: Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
recovery.descriptionWithName: Welcome, {{name}}! Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
recovery.warningDescription: This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to your device. There is NO password reset. Write it down and store it securely offline.
recovery.confirmWrittenDown: I have written down my recovery phrase and stored it in a secure location. I understand that if I lose this phrase, I will permanently lose access to my account.
recovery.verifyDescription: Enter the requested words from your recovery phrase to confirm you have saved it correctly.
recovery.verificationFailed: One or more words are incorrect. Please check your recovery phrase and try again.
recovery.verifyHint: Can't remember? Go back to view your recovery phrase again, but make sure to write it down this time!
recovery.recoverDesc: Enter your 24-word recovery phrase to reset your password and recover access to your account.
recovery.recoverDescWithName: Enter the 24-word recovery phrase for "{{name}}" to set a new password.
recovery.secureDesc: Your recovery phrase is never sent to any server. It is only used locally to derive your private key.
recovery.invalidPhrase: Please enter a valid 24-word recovery phrase.
recovery.newPasswordDesc: Create a new password to protect your account on this device.
recovery.passwordWarning: This password encrypts your private key on this device. If you forget it, you will need your recovery phrase again.
recovery.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
recovery.successDesc: Your account has been recovered and you are now logged in.
recovery.failed: Recovery failed. Please check your recovery phrase.

logout.warningDescription: You haven't created a backup for this account. If you logout and forget your password, you may permanently lose access.
logout.noRecoveryDescription: BuildIt has no server-side password recovery. Your recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your account if you forget your password.
logout.identityLocked: Identity is locked. Please unlock first to view your recovery phrase.
logout.saveBackupDescription: Write down these 24 words and store them securely. This is your only way to recover your account.
logout.phraseWarning: Anyone with this phrase can access your account. Store it securely offline and never share it.

backup.reminderDescription: Your account is not backed up. Save your recovery phrase to prevent losing access.
backup.dialogDescription: This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to this device.
backup.phraseWarning: Write down these words and store them securely offline. Anyone with this phrase can access your account.

messages.title: Messages
messages.selectConversation: Select a conversation or start a new one
messages.invalidPublicKey: Invalid public key. Must be 64 hex characters.

security.confirmSignOutAll: Are you sure you want to sign out from all devices? You will need to sign in again on each device.

troubleshooting.checkBiometric: Check that biometric is enabled on your device
troubleshooting.trySecurityKey: Try using a security key instead
troubleshooting.updateBrowser: Update your browser to the latest version

friends.title: Friends & Contacts
friends.subtitle: Manage your connections and friend requests
friends.noFriendsHint: Try adjusting your filters or add some friends!
friends.chooseHowConnect: Choose how you'd like to connect with your friend

hotlines.title: Hotlines
hotlines.subtitle: Manage call lines, dispatch, and coordination
hotlines.selectHotline: Select a hotline to view calls
hotlines.selectHotlineToView: Select a hotline to view calls and operators

pages.updateNameDescription: Update your group's name and description
pages.chooseModules: Choose which modules are available for this group
pages.publicAccess: Anyone can see this group and join

posts.placeholder: What's on your mind? Share updates, organize actions, build solidarity...
posts.selectFutureDate: Please select a future date and time
posts.groupOnlyDesc: Only members of your groups can see this
posts.publicDesc: Visible to anyone, shared on public relays
posts.followersDesc: Only people who follow you can see this
posts.encryptedDesc: End-to-end encrypted, only specific people can decrypt
posts.makePublicWarning: Public posts are visible to anyone on the internet and will be shared on public Nostr relays.
posts.publicActivistWarning: For activist organizing, consider whether this content should remain private to protect your community.

templates.title: Choose a Template
templates.subtitle: Choose a template to get started quickly with pre-configured modules.
templates.sampleDataDescription: Populate the group with example content to help you get started
templates.manualModeDescription: Manual mode: You'll select individual modules in the next step.
